name: Summit's Journey ||GameJam= Mini-Jam:Summit
description:
This Game Was made in 72 hours and with a limitation that you can only use the WASD and Arrow Keys.

In the Tutorial you can Try out your moves on the Dummy, He wont Attack but can Die like every other enemy.

Enemies dont have Healthbar's because i ran out of time.but each enemy has the same amount of health. i can confirm that you can kill every enemy. if he rotates to you ,the game isnt bugged.

WASD Moving.

  • A+D Combat mode:
  • W-ForwardAttack
  • A-LeftAttack
  • D-RightAttack
  • S-LowerAttack

ArrowKeys Dashing/(Moving in Combat mode) Around

ComboList:

  • D-UpArrow | uppercut
  • UpArrow-W | Kick
  • UpArrow-S | Highkick
  • UpArrow-D | Smash
  • A-DownArrow-D | SpinKick
  • DownArrow-UpArrow-D | UpperSmash
